entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:54 a.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 8:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 5.8°C
Wind: calm km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 14.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
